Icons

FontAwesome icons are imported through bower and the fontcustom icons are compiled in the assets/fontcustom folder. View FontAwesome icons or View fontcustom icons

<i class="fa fa-bed"></i> <i class="fa customicon-iDmembers"></i>

Grid

An updated version of the media box.

<div class="grid"> <div class="column-4"> First </div> <div class="column-4"> Middle </div> <div class="column-4"> Last </div> </div>

Grid Modifiers

Reversed, no gutter and stacked on mobile. Small gutters.

<div class="grid grid--reverse grid--no_gutter grid--collapse"> <div class="column-4"> First </div> <div class="column-4"> Middle </div> <div class="column-4"> Last </div> </div> <div class="grid grid--gutter_small"> <div class="column-4"> First </div> <div class="column-4"> Middle </div> <div class="column-4"> Last </div> </div>

Column Modifiers

Alignment, offsets and fixed widths

<div class="grid"> <div class="column-4 column--left column--bottom"> Left Bottom </div> <div class="column-4 column--right column--middle"> Right Middle </div> <div class="column-4 column--top column--center"> Top Center </div> </div> <div class="grid grid--gutter_small"> <div class="column-4 column--push-8"> Pushed </div> <div class="column-8 column--pull-4"> Pulled </div> </div> <div class="grid grid--collapse grid--reverse"> <div class="column--fixed-100"> Fixed Left </div> <div class="column-12 column--left-100 column--right-100"> Sharing Fixed elements </div> <div class="column--fixed-100"> Fixed Right </div> </div>

Forms and Validation

Demonstrating form elements and majestic validation

<form class="form_pretty"> <div class="grid grid--gutter_small grid--collapse"> <div class="column-4"> <label class="textfield textfield--label_bordered"> <input type="text" name="fullname" Kit modal

Modal that

<div class="overlay" id="modal-one"> <div class="modal"> <span class="close js-close-modal" data-id="modal-one"></span> <h3>Modal Title</h3> <p>Modal Description</p> </div> </div> <button class="js-show-modal" data-id="modal-one">Show Modal 1</button>

Kit tabs

Simple tab navigation for showing/hiding content

<div class="tabs" id="js-group-1"> <div class="tabs-toggle js-toggle-tab tabs-toggle--is_active" data-id="tab-one"> Tab One </div> <div class="tabs-toggle js-toggle-tab" data-id="tab-two"> Tab Two </div> </div> <div class="js-group-1"> <div class="tabs-content js-tabs-content tabs-content--is_active" id="tab-one"> Tab One </div> <div class="tabs-content js-tabs-content" id="tab-two"> Tab Two </div> </div>

Kit Accordion

Simple accordion for toggling content

<div class="accordion js-toggle-accordion" data-id="js-accordion-1"> Toggle Accordion 1 </div> <div class="accordion_content" id="js-accordion-1"> Accordion 1 Content </div> <div class="accordion accordion--is_last js-toggle-accordion" data-id="js-accordion-2"> Toggle Accordion 2 </div> <div class="accordion_content" id="js-accordion-2"> Accordion 2 Content </div>

Kit Popover

Simple popover that will display on hover

<div class="popover_parent js-hover-popover" data-id="js-popover-1"> <i class="fa fa-question-circle"></i> <div class="popover popover--tooltip popover--below" id="js-popover-1"> The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog, so quickly. </div> </div> <div class="popover_parent js-click-popover" data-id="js-popover-2"> <a href="javascript:;">Click Popover</a> <div class="popover popover--tooltip popover--below" id="js-popover-2"> The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog, so quickly. </div> </div>

Typography

Connected Elements

<div class="type type--hero"> <h1>Landing page hero</h1> <p class="subtitle">Landing page hero subtitle</p> </div> <hr /> <div class="type type--hero"> <h2>Subpage hero</h2> <p class="subtitle">Subpage hero subtitle</p> </div> <hr /> <div class="type type--description"> <h2>Landing page description</h2> <p class="subtitle">Landing page description subtitle</p> </div> <hr /> <div class="type type--description"> <h3>Subpage description</h3> <p class="subtitle">Subpage description subtitle</p> </div> <hr /> <div class="type type--quote container--large container--tight_y"> <p class="type--quote-body"> Check your credit report for new accounts that you did not open.Are there charges to your credit card that you did not authorize? Have collection agencies contacted you about unpaid bills thatdon’t belong to you? You may be the victim of identity theft. </p> <p class="type--quote-attribution"> -Lisa Verano, San Francisco </p> </div>

Modules

Styleguide elements can be tied together very naturally. Below are a couple of beautiful examples.

<div class="container container--teal"> <div class="wrapper wrapper--padded"> <div class="type type--white type--hero u-ta-center"> <h1>Welcome to the Jungle</h1> <p class="subtitle">I guess you could say it's getting pretty serious.</p> </div> </div> </div> <div class="container"> <div class="wrapper"> <div class="container container--tight container--white container--bordered"> <div class="icon_header icon_header--large fa-envelope"> Email </div> <div class="container"> <div class="grid"> <div class="column-6 column--middle"> <p>Share your email?</p> </div> <div class="column-6 column--middle column--right"> <button>Yes</button> <button class="btn--secondary">Nah</button> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
